channel.title: hand-eye coordination on Miss Amanda
channel.description: Recent content in hand-eye coordination on Miss Amanda

item.title: Folding
item.description: Materials: One basket containing five square pieces of cloth, each about 5 or 6 inches. Each cloth has the following stitching: One line down the middle Two intersecting lines One diagonal line Two diagonal intersecting lines Without stitching Presentation: Invite the child to fold. Grasp the basket with two hands and carry it to a table.
